Ren applications and one of the issues

a source takes an event from a third
party system for example a GitHub event
or a Kafka record wrapping it into a
cloud event and emitting this into the
system Cloud event as Evan said in the
previous talk is a can be seen as a

Brokers and triggers and those are

broker provides a discoverable endpoint
for event incest so where events get
sent to and the trigger is then
responsible for um the event delivery
and another thing about triggers is that
you can apply filtering so that
filtering based on certain attributes of
the cloud event so that only certain
Cloud events get
forwarded another building block in K of
Eventing are syns and the sync can be
simply seen as a way to get um events
out of your event MH and talk to a third
party system for example taking a cloud
event talking to a to the slack API by
